            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AF%94%E5%88%A9%E6%97%B6%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BF%912%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#比利时新冠肺炎确诊病例近2万#</a>】4月5日，比利时联邦公共健康服务局和比利时危机处理中心联合发布消息，比利时较前一日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例1260例，累计确诊病例达19691例；死亡病例为1447例，新增164例。当前，比利时共有5735名确诊患者住院接受治疗，1261名患者处于重症监护，累计治愈出院3751人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBWh5CdzM" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490421479108654:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490421479108654&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【至少59名医护人员倒在岗位上，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BC%85%E6%80%80%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E7%9A%84%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#缅怀战疫一线牺牲的英雄#</a>】梁武东，蒋金波，宋云花，宋英杰…疫情之中，至少 59名医务工作者牺牲在一线，他们的名字将永被铭记。感谢为这场战疫拼过命的人，致敬英雄！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报视频">@人民日报视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490420727342183:1034-video:1034%3A4490330385350687:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490420727342183:2803301701" title="人民日报视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZmQJ4g" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZmQJ4g" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                <ul class="clearfix">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B9%A0%E8%BF%91%E5%B9%B3%E7%9A%84%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E6%97%A5%E5%8E%86%23&amp;from=default">#习近平的战疫日历#</a>】新冠肺炎疫情，牵动着每一个人的心。习近平总书记时刻关注着疫情防控工作，亲自指挥、亲自部署，每天都作出口头指示和批示。他主持召开会议，考察调研，同外国领导人保持密切联系……这份密集的战“疫”日历，记录下他繁忙的工作状态↓↓&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490414772429576:1034-video:1034%3A4490412682051594:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490414772429576:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Zu831W" alt="http://t.cn/A6Zu831W" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2803301701/IBW6hac2I&amp;mid=4490414772429576&amp;name=人民日报&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;domain=rmrb" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>4569</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E6023%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新增6023例新冠肺炎#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1130759%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙累计130759例新冠肺炎#</a>】据西班牙卫生部5日公布的数据，西班牙较前日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例6023例，新增死亡病例674例，累计确诊病例达130759例，其中12418人死亡，38080人治愈出院。为了进一步遏制疫情，西班牙政府也于4日表示，将向议会申请将国家紧急状态延长 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBVTCipsd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490406924387753:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490406924387753&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【约翰斯·霍普金斯大学：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%95%B0%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E8%B6%8510%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球单日新增病例数首次超10万#</a>】美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学5日发布的全球新冠疫情最新统计数据显示，全球单日新增确诊病例数首次超过10万例，累计确诊病例数已超过120万例。数据显示，全球4日新增确诊病例超过101500例。截至美国东部时间5日2时44分（北京时间5日14时44分），全 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBVQJcgWj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490405132925055:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490405132925055&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2803301701/IBVPW9N2I&amp;mid=4490404642333476&amp;name=人民日报&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;domain=rmrb&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1gdj0xazg2bj20fr0mrx59" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>641</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

                                <a name="4490398837490125" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBVGzvqwt?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 17:12" date="1586077973000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490398837490125:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 17:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%9C%A8%E7%9F%AD%E6%9C%9F%E5%86%85%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E7%BB%93%E6%9D%9F%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%8D%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#北京疫情防控在短期内完全结束是不可能的#</a>】4月5日下午，第72场北京市新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会召开。北京市委宣传部副部长徐和建表示，首都北京疫情防控形势依然严峻复杂，不可掉以轻心。有两个关键词值得重视，一是疫情防控常态化。首都北京疫情防控在短期内完全结束是不可能的，很 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBVGzvqwt" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490398837490125:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490398837490125&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">

                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

          <i class="W_loading" style="display:none;"></i>
                     <i class="W_loading" style="display:none;"></i>
                    </li>
    </ul>
                    </div>
    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                                                                                    <!-- feed区 大数据tag -->
                    </div>
        <div class="WB_like" node-type="templeLike_ani" action-data="parise_id=p_0000" style="display:none;">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490392898967051" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBVwZBCJR?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 16:49" date="1586076557000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490392898967051:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 16:49</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">科学科普 · 视频社区</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%91%BC%E5%90%81%E5%85%AC%E4%BC%97%E7%BB%A7%E7%BB%AD%E4%BF%9D%E6%8C%81%E8%B7%9D%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山呼吁公众继续保持距离#</a>】本周，中国工程院院士钟南山通过世界卫生组织，给大家提醒：不管是在居家、公司或者是公共场所，保持一定的距离非常重要。当前不要参加集会，也不要聚餐。低风险不等于无风险。随着返工复工的进行和学生陆续复学，大众依然要高度注意个人卫生健康习惯。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBVwZBCJR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490392898967051:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490392898967051&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490389056353604" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBVqNqERu?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 16:34" date="1586075641000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490389056353604:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 16:34</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【详情通报！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%9B%BE%E5%9C%A8%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E5%81%9C%E7%95%99%23&amp;from=default">#北京一新增输入病例曾在小区居家停留#</a>】4月5日下午，第72场北京市新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会召开。北京市疾控中心副主任庞星火通报了昨日境外输入确诊病例情况。庞星火表示，4月4日，本市新增报告境外输入新冠肺炎病例1例。<br>某女，无业。2019年9月前往英国伦敦探亲。2020年3 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBVqNqERu" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490389056353604:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490389056353604&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490388276937353" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBVpxt6IN?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 16:30" date="1586075455000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490388276937353:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 16:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【商务部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%83%A8%E5%88%86%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E4%B8%8D%E5%90%88%E6%A0%BC%E7%9A%84%E6%8A%A5%E9%81%93%E4%B8%8D%E5%AE%A2%E8%A7%82%23&amp;from=default">#部分出口医疗物资不合格的报道不客观#</a>】商务部外贸司一级巡视员江帆介绍，通过多方调查了解，我们发现有关报道并没有客观地反映事实全貌，有些媒体完全归咎于中国产品质量不过关，实际上原因是多方面的。比如，中外产品的质量标准不同，使用习惯上存在差异，甚至使用者操作不当也能引发一些 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBVpxt6IN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490388276937353:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490388276937353&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490385919827320" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBVlJFexa?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 16:21" date="1586074893000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490385919827320:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 16:21</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E4%B8%BA%E4%BD%95%E7%8C%9B%E5%A2%9E%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织分析全球疫情数据为何猛增#</a>】世卫组织卫生紧急项目负责人称，当前新冠肺炎疫情数据其实是至少两周前感染情况的集中体现。虽然目前各国都已出台空前严格的抗疫措施，但要看到显著效果仍需时日。换言之，两周甚至更早之前，一些国家的政府和民众对疫情威胁认知还不够，未能采取足够有效的防控 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBVlJFexa" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490385919827320:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490385919827320&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 投诉 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：介绍<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%B8%82%E9%87%8D%E7%82%B9%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E5%BA%8F%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%8D%E4%BA%A7%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#武汉市重点行业有序复工复产情况#</a>】4月5日下午四点，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第64场新闻发布会，介绍武汉市重点行业有序复工复产情况，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓一起关注。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490380710056909:1034-video:1034%3A4490393622872073:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490380710056909:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZucEPO" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZucEPO" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->
                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBVlugxkn&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490380693079756" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBVdjcVbu?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 16:00" date="1586073646000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490380693079756:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                    <!-- 回复 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%233%E6%9C%88%E4%BB%A5%E6%9D%A5%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A338.6%E4%BA%BF%E5%8F%AA%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#3月以来我国已出口38.6亿只口罩#</a>】海关总署综合业务司司长金海介绍，从3月1日到4月4日，全国共验放出口主要疫情防控物资价值102亿元，主要包括口罩约38.6亿只，价值77.2亿元；防护服3752万件，价值9.1亿元；红外测温仪241万件，价值3.31亿元；呼吸机1.6万台，价值3.1亿元；新型冠状病毒检测试剂284 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBV9aslfn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490378126754861:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490378126754861&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511448&amp;ssig=QABIWJSMWw" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490373780609551" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBV2a2yzt?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 15:33" date="1586071999000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490373780609551:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 15:33</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%B2%A1%E6%9C%89%E4%B9%9F%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%23&amp;from=default">#中国没有也不会限制医疗物资出口#</a>】针对中国是否会限制关键医疗物资出口的问题，商务部外贸司一级巡视员江帆表示，中国有句古话叫“滴水之恩，涌泉相报”，我们不会忘记在抗击疫情之初，许多国家对我们施以援手。因此在中国疫情防控形势向好，国外疫情加速蔓延之际，我们愿意在做好国内疫情防控的基 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBV2a2yzt" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490373780609551:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490373780609551&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511448&amp;ssig=QABIWJSMWw" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490371960722733" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBUZe320Z?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 15:26" date="1586071565000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490371960722733:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 15:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%235%E7%B1%BB%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E5%87%AD%E8%AF%81%E4%B9%A6%E9%AA%8C%E6%94%BE%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%23&amp;from=default">#5类医疗物资凭证书验放出口#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B7%B2%E9%AA%8C%E6%94%BE%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%E4%B8%BB%E8%A6%81%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E4%BB%B7%E5%80%BC102%E4%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#已验放出口主要防疫物资价值102亿#</a>】5日，海关总署综合业务司司长金海表示，3月1日以来海关总署共验放出口主要疫情防控物资价值102亿。海关总署对于新型冠状病毒检测试剂、医用口罩、医用防护服、呼吸机、红外体温计等出口医疗物资，严格凭药监部门批准的医疗器械产品 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBUZe320Z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490371960722733:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490371960722733&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490368425104250" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBUTwlpQC?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 15:12" date="1586070722000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490368425104250:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 15:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B3300%E4%BE%8B%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#现有重症病例降至300例以下#</a>】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人、宣传司副司长米锋介绍，4月4日，现有本土重症病例降至300例以下，本土确诊病例降至700例以下，救治效果明显。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E9%AB%98%E6%B0%B4%E5%B9%B3%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E5%9B%A2%E9%98%9F%E7%BB%A7%E7%BB%AD%E5%9D%9A%E5%AE%88%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#国家高水平医疗团队继续坚守武汉#</a>，为重症患者一人一策制定治疗方案，提高治愈率。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490368425104250:1042163-video:1042163%3A4490368348258310:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490368425104250:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZuAHbf" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZuAHbf" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制召开新闻发布会，介绍加强医疗物资质量管理和规范市场秩序工作情况，请商务部、海关总署、国家市场监督管理总局和国家药品监督管理局相关司局负责人等回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播，关注↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490365484322000:1034-video:1034%3A4490378498474012:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490365484322000:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZuZ2m6" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZuZ2m6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBUBi41yg&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511448&amp;ssig=QABIWJSMWw" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490357120959280" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBUBi41yg?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 14:27" date="1586068027000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490357120959280:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 14:27</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%9B%BE%E5%9C%A8%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E5%81%9C%E7%95%99%23&amp;from=default">#北京一新增输入病例曾在小区居家停留#</a>】据北京市疾病预防控制中心，4月4日0时至24时，北京市新增报告1例境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例，来自英国，有市内小区短暂居家停留（不足24小时），涉及的小区是：朝阳区团结湖街道团结湖公寓。再次提醒：境外华人华侨和留学生，境外生活或旅行要时刻做好个人防护 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBUBi41yg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490357120959280:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490357120959280&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E8%AF%A6%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#山东公布现有无症状感染者详情#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E6%9C%80%E5%B0%8F%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E4%BB%851%E5%B2%81%23&amp;from=default">#山东最小无症状感染者仅1岁#</a>】据山东省卫健委，目前山东全省现有正在接受隔离观察治疗的无症状感染者12例，其中境外输入11例，本地1例。相关信息如下:<br>本地1例:<br>孙某某，女，1岁。患儿父亲1月29日被确诊新冠肺炎，患儿于2月4日经核酸检测结果阳性，无发热、咳嗽等 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBUh3EX0T" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490344579759971:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490344579759971&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="WB_face W_fl">
        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6559724328"><img alt="天猫精灵本精" src="https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.828.828.1024/0079VVXily8gkmlxp6qumj30n00n0gmm.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511549&amp;ssig=u%2FMnt%2BOTrK" usercard="id=6559724328"></a>

    <!-- 评论头像 -->

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6559724328" usercard="id=6559724328">天猫精灵本精</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon_co1 icon_approve_co"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：无症状感染者开始没有症状，仅核酸阳性，之后出现症状，这类属于潜伏期。过了潜伏期也没症状，就属于携带者，这才是真正的无症状感染者。有症状的感染者可以隔离，无症状感染者因难发现，就有不断传染给健康人的风险，消灭病毒的难度就大。并且病毒有可能潜伏下来，使有些人成为携带者，防控就很麻烦。        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9D%AD%E5%B7%9E%E5%B8%82%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E5%B1%80%E6%B0%B8%E4%B9%85%E5%B0%81%E5%AD%9816%E4%B8%AA%E8%AD%A6%E5%8F%B7%23&amp;from=default">#杭州市公安局永久封存16个警号#</a> ，每个警号背后都是一位因公牺牲的民警】近日，杭州市公安局宣布永久保留16个警号，每个警号背后都是一位因公牺牲的民警。16个警号，列入特殊警号库封存。致敬↓<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490338175646476:1034-video:1034%3A4490056035926055:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490338175646476:2803301701" title="杭州日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZEtHt8" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZEtHt8" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>杭州日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%84%E5%B1%B1%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2%E8%BE%BE2%E4%B8%87%E4%B8%8A%E9%99%90%23&amp;from=default">#黄山游客达2万上限#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%84%E5%B1%B1%E6%99%AF%E5%8C%BA%E5%81%9C%E6%AD%A2%E6%8E%A5%E5%BE%85%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2%23&amp;from=default">#黄山景区停止接待游客#</a>】安徽省黄山风景区管理委员会网站5日发布公告称，目前景区进山人数已达到游客流量限制两万人，停止游客入园。请游客选择其他旅游路线，或改日进山。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6Zml2RO" alt="http://t.cn/A6Zml2RO" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9B%B7%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%9C%A8%E6%9A%96%E9%98%B3%E4%B8%8B%E5%BC%A0%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%8C%E8%87%82%23&amp;from=default">#雷神山出院患者在暖阳下张开双臂#</a>：感觉太美好，把命捡回来了】4日，武汉雷神山医院C3病区，最后两名患者出院，C3病区清零。患者张女士和儿子于3月23日转入雷神山进行治疗，此前病情一直反复。走出病区，张女士的儿子站在暖阳下张开双臂感叹：“感觉太美好，把命捡回来了。”<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490328885118982:2017607-video:2017607%3A4490139557101575:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490328885118982:2803301701" title="新京报我们视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZEDYzr" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZEDYzr" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>新京报我们视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>

        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%833%E4%BE%8B%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%AF%A6%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#广州公布3例关联病例详情#</a>：均为密切接触者排查发现】2020年4月4日0时至24时，广州市报告新增确诊病例5例，其中境外输入病例2例（美国1例、加拿大1例），境外输入关联病例3例。新增出院病例8例（其中境外输入5例）。3例关联病例为密切接触者主动排查发现。其中：<br>境外输入关联病例1：女，52 岁，中 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBTDq4JYl" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490320001130033:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490320001130033&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B5%B5%E8%8B%B1%E6%98%8E%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%B8%89%E5%8F%A3%E6%97%B6%E9%9A%9467%E5%A4%A9%E7%B4%A7%E7%B4%A7%E7%9B%B8%E6%8B%A5%23&amp;from=default">#赵英明一家三口时隔67天紧紧相拥#</a>】3日下午，四川广元援鄂医疗队的49名队员回到家乡，赵英明也在其中。曾承诺“包一年家务”的丈夫蒋昊峻带着儿子早早守候在现场。团聚时刻，父子俩为凯旋归来的赵英明献上粉色玫瑰花，分别67天后的一家人紧紧相拥在一起。网友：祝幸福！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490317065299229:2017607-video:2017607%3A4490079973081112:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490317065299229:2803301701" title="中新视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZE47Os" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZE47Os" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>中新视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" action-data="cid=4490359755189040&amp;is_more=1&amp;type=small&amp;ouid=" action-type="commentDialogue">查看对话</a></span></li>

                                <!-- 回复 -->

                                    <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                                </li>
                                <!-- 回复 -->

                                <li><span class="line S_line1">

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2661188341&amp;cid=4490312569092378&amp;nick=要很好很好的活下去&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490301126925294" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBT8Yt3Ai?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 10:44" date="1586054677000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490301126925294:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 10:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%9C%9F%E6%9C%AB%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E4%B8%8D%E5%BE%97%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A0%E9%9A%BE%E5%BA%A6%23&amp;from=default">#北京要求期末考试不得增加难度#</a>】日前，北京市教委发布中小学春季学期教学安排，明确从4月13日开始，中小学将结合实际实现“线上线下”无缝衔接，建立与疫情防控常态化相适应的课程教学机制。通知要求，期末考试由各区统一指导学校组织实施，各校不得额外扩大考试范围和增加考试难度。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBT8Yt3Ai" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490301126925294:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490301126925294&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【全球组网收官战！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%80%E9%A2%97%E5%8C%97%E6%96%97%E4%B8%89%E5%8F%B7%E7%BB%84%E7%BD%91%E5%8D%AB%E6%98%9F%E8%BF%90%E6%8A%B5%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E5%9C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#最后一颗北斗三号组网卫星运抵发射场#</a>，计划于5月份发射】4月4日，第五十五颗北斗导航卫星，也即北斗三号最后一颗组网卫星，如期运抵西昌卫星发射中心，这标志着<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E6%96%97%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%98%9F%E5%BA%A7%E7%BB%84%E7%BD%91%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%A5%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E5%86%B2%E5%88%BA%23&amp;from=default">#北斗全球星座组网进入最后冲刺#</a>阶段。该卫星属地球静止轨道卫星，将在西昌卫星发射中心开展测试、总装、加注等工作， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBSVT5XXS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490293011422148:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490293011422148&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4490293011422148"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>842</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511455&amp;ssig=InE6GqFBwO" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490290625074467" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBSS2li6f?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 10:02" date="1586052172000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490290625074467:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 10:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：春暖花开·<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232020%E5%B9%B4%E6%95%85%E5%AE%AB%E5%8D%9A%E7%89%A9%E9%99%A2%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#2020年故宫博物院首次直播#</a>】2020，紫禁城迎来600年。春暖花开，尚未开放的静谧紫禁城有着怎样生机盎然的春天？<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 新媒体联合故宫博物院，带你一起“去故宫，云赏春”！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490290625074467:1042152-live:1042152%3A9758aec9cb48c66613426391e32fff88" title="人民日报的微博直播" href="http://t.cn/A6ZmPJmt" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZmPJmt" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>人民日报的微博直播</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【约翰斯·霍普金斯大学：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%85120%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎确诊超120万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学实时统计数据，截至北京时间4月5日8时51分，全球新冠肺炎确诊病例超过120万例，达1201591例，死亡病例达64703例。数据显示，全球新冠肺炎确诊病例最多的国家是美国，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A31%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#美国累计确诊31万例新冠肺炎#</a>，达311301例；死亡病例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBSObg3io" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490288233825920:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490288233825920&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=7291617014&amp;cid=4490289634421496&amp;nick=城南月涌&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <a name="4490286258379673" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBSKZz9W1?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 09:45" date="1586051132000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490286258379673:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 09:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【最新通报：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E6%A3%AE%E6%9E%97%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E5%85%AD%E4%B8%AA%E7%89%87%E5%8C%BA%E5%9D%87%E6%9C%AA%E5%A4%8D%E7%87%83%23&amp;from=default">#西昌森林火灾六个片区均未复燃#</a>】4月4日18:00至5日8:00，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%232108%E5%90%8D%E6%89%91%E7%81%AB%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%BD%BB%E5%A4%9C%E5%80%BC%E5%AE%88%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E7%81%AB%E5%9C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#2108名扑火人员彻夜值守西昌火场#</a>，分东线泸山正面、南线正大酒庄后山、南线大营农场响水沟、西线经久、北线马道、北线乌龟塘六个片区，对过火区域进行拉网式排查， 东线泸山正面共清理烟点8个，南线大营农场响水沟清理烟点1个， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBSKZz9W1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490286258379673:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490286258379673&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490278830777313" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBSz13gdj?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 09:16" date="1586049361000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490278830777313:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 09:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%9D%87%E4%B8%BA%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增5例本土病例均为关联病例#</a>】据广东省卫健委通报，4月4日0-24时，广东省新增境外输入确诊病例3例，分别为广州报告2例（美国、加拿大输入各1例）、深圳报告1例（美国输入）。全省累计报告境外输入病例165例。广州报告3例，揭阳报告2例境外输入关联病例。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增5例本土病例#</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBSz13gdj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490278830777313:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490278830777313&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->
        <div class="WB_func clearfix">
            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E8%A7%81%E4%B8%88%E5%A4%AB%E6%8E%A5%E6%9C%BA%E8%BF%9E%E8%BF%9E%E6%91%86%E6%89%8B%23&amp;from=default">#援鄂护士见丈夫接机连连摆手#</a>：“不能过来！”】3月28日，吉林省第三批支援湖北医疗队的医护人员返回家乡。吉林市人民医院血液科护士毕明明，已经离家50多天，她的丈夫偷偷来机场送上惊喜。喜极而泣的毕护士无法上前拥抱，只能连连摆手：“不能过来！”。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4490275399624659:2017607-video:2017607%3A4490129394302993:page_100206_home:2803301701:4490275399624659:2803301701" title="燃新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZE1JzR" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZE1JzR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>燃新闻的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609511455&amp;ssig=InE6GqFBwO" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490265744359919" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBSdUiidh?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 08:24" date="1586046241000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490265744359919:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 08:24</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E13%E4%BE%8B%E4%BF%84%E7%BD%97%E6%96%AF%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江新增13例俄罗斯输入病例#</a>：均由符拉迪沃斯托克经绥芬河口岸入境】2020年4月4日0-24时，黑龙江省无新增确诊病例，无新增疑似病例，新增境外输入确诊病例13例（境外输入无症状感染者转为确诊病例2例）。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%8313%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%AF%A6%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江公布13例境外输入病例详情#</a>：戳→<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6ZnTlKi" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZnTlKi" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490258425153549" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBS26lCFL?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 07:54" date="1586044496000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490258425153549:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 07:54</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A50%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北昨日0新增#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E23%E4%BE%8B%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#湖北新增23例无症状感染者#</a>】据湖北省卫健委通报，2020年4月4日0—24时，全省新增新冠肺炎确诊病例0例，无境外输入病例。<br><br>全省新增病亡3例，其中：武汉市3例，其他16个市州均为0例。<br><br>全省新增出院183例，其中：武汉市183例，其他16个市州均为0例。<br><br>截至2020年4月4日24时，全省 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBS26lCFL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490258425153549:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490258425153549&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E25%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增25例境外输入病例#</a>】据国家卫健委数据统计，4月4日0—24时，新增25例境外输入病例。境外输入现有确诊病例697例（含重症病例18例），现有疑似病例107例。累计确诊病例913例，累计治愈出院病例216例，累计死亡病例0例。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E47%E4%BE%8B%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增47例无症状感染者#</a>】4月4日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者47例,其中境外输入无症状感染者16例；当日转为确诊病例3例（境外输入3例）；当日解除医学观察50例（境外输入8例）。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%9A%E5%9C%A8%E5%8C%BB%E5%AD%A6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%851024%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#尚在医学观察无症状感染者1024例#</a>（境外输入244例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A30%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊30例#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增5例本土病例#</a>】4月4日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例30例，其中25例为境外输入病例，5例为本土病例（广东5例）；新增死亡病例3例（湖北3例）；新增疑似病例11例，均为境外输入病例。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病例213例，解除医 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBRXDqGdE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490255656358822:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490255656358822&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4490250024282917" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBROyhYbj?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-05 07:21" date="1586042493000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4490250024282917:fromprofile"> 2020-4-5 07:21</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E7%A7%B0%E6%8E%A5%E4%B8%8B%E6%9D%A5%E4%B8%A4%E5%91%A8%E6%98%AF%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%80%E4%B8%A5%E5%B3%BB%E6%97%B6%E5%88%BB%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普称接下来两周是美国最严峻时刻#</a>，死亡人数将会激增】当地时间4月4日，在白宫记者发布会上，特朗普称在接下来两周将是美国抗疫形势最严峻的时刻，死亡人数将会激增。特朗普还表示，自己会动用一切资源和手段，结束这场针对新冠肺炎疫情的战争，民众急需复工。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E7%A7%B0%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%BF%85%E9%A1%BB%E9%87%8D%E6%96%B0%E5%BC%80%E6%94%BE%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普称美国必须重新开放#</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBROyhYbj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490250024282917:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490250024282917&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E5%B0%86%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E6%89%80%E5%9C%A8%E5%8C%BA%E5%9F%9F%E7%BA%B3%E5%85%A5%E8%80%83%E8%AF%84%E8%8C%83%E5%9B%B4%23&amp;from=default">#武汉首次将无症状感染者所在区域纳入考评范围#</a>】4月4日，武汉市新冠肺炎疫情防控指挥部社区疫情防控组公布全市第十一次评定的无疫情小区、社区、村（大队）名单，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%97%A0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%B0%8F%E5%8C%BA%E5%8D%A0%E6%AF%9498.4%25%23&amp;from=default">#武汉无疫情小区占比98.4%#</a>。从该次评定开始，将无症状感染者所在区域纳入考评范围，无症状感染者所在小区按规定取消或暂停无疫情认定 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBRL5850N" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4490247871925893:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4490247871925893&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                             【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\"                                                                                           【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\"                                     </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="fold_ctrl_area" title="展开" action-type="toggle_fold" node-type="toggle_fold"><div class="mask"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_unfold ico_fold"></a></div></div>
